## bold() function

Surrounds the given text with bold signs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function bold(text: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string | The text to display |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Markdown-formatted text
